name: Avatarg
description:
Avatarg generates a beautiful type of avatars for your app design prototype with one simple click.


How to use plugin:

1. 👤 Select one shape or multiple shapes.

2. 🎨 Style your avatar.

3. ✨ Generate.


---


Submit your ideas 😃 and suggestions:

✍️ https://avatarg.nolt.io


Happy designing 👨🏻‍🎨.
